FuncDef: This command sets the Add-Paths send-limit to a specific value for all routes matched by the policy entry or default action. Add-Paths allows a BGP router to send multiple paths for the same NLRI/prefix to a peer advertising the Add-Paths receive capability. The send-limit dictates the maximum number of paths that can be advertised.

ParaDef.Info: Specify the maximum number of paths to advertise for matched routes to an Add-Paths peer. Values-1to16.
